channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 'Put plainly...some countries are already using AI to solve harder problems and move faster': OpenAI wants to make AI usage more equal between countries - but will it actually work?
item.description: OpenAI highlights uneven AI adoption across countries and launches Education for Countries to improve skills, access, and workforce readiness globally.

item.title: IKEA kitchen trends for 2026: cozy up with warm petrol blue and walnut accessories, from $2.50
item.description: Add some winter warmth to your home with natural wood and ceramics for a look that's modern but snug.

item.title: ‘Halo’ Actor Steve Downes Asks You Not to Remake His Voice with AI
item.description: The man behind Master Chief feels a way about generative AI when it comes to his voice being used for any 'Halo' fan project or video.

item.title: Microsoft unveils first robotics model targeted at boosting physical AI in a bid to free robots from the production line
item.description: Microsoft introduces Rho-alpha, a robotics model combining language, touch, simulation, and human feedback to extend robots beyond predictable factory environments.
